mapper.insert: insert into parkinginfo(username, merchantname, merchantaddress, merchantimage, businesslicense, phone, linkman, QQ) values (#{username}, #{merchantname}, #{merchantaddress}, #{merchantimage}, #{businesslicense}, #{phone}, #{linkman}, #{QQ})
mapper.update: update parkingInfo set merchantname = #{merchantname}, merchantaddress = #{merchantaddress}, merchantimage = #{merchantimage}, businesslicense = #{businesslicense}, phone = #{phone}, linkman = #{linkman}, QQ = #{QQ} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select * from parkinginfo, location, merchantstate where username = #{username} and location.merchantname = parkingInfo.merchantname and merchantstate.merchantname = location.merchantname order by merchantstate.operatingstate DESC, merchantstate.auditstate ASC
select * from parkinginfo, location, merchantstate where location.merchantname = parkinginfo.merchantname and merchantstate.merchantname = location.merchantname
